articles.description: Harry Brook says supporters have “every right to be annoyed” by his behaviour after he was punched by a nightclub bouncer on England’s tour of New Zealand that preceded the Ashes.
articles.title: Harry Brook: England white-ball captain on being punched by bouncer in New Zealand

articles.description: Jude Bellingham responds to partying claims with a goal celebration in the Champions League win over Monaco.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: England midfielder responds to partying claims

articles.description: After Emma Raducanu suffered a humbling second-round exit, BBC Sport analyses what went wrong and where the Briton goes from here.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Emma Raducanu loses in second round - what went wrong?

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz, Aryna Sabalenka, Coco Gauff and Emma Raducanu are in second-round action at the Australian Open - listen to BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra coverage and follow text updates.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026 LIVE: Emma Raducanu vs Anastasia Potapova - scores, radio & updates

articles.description: Manchester City suffered their very own "hell of a beating" moment in Norway on Tuesday - now Pep Guardiola and his players must turn around their fortunes in an increasingly trying January.
articles.title: Man City 'battered in Bodo' - is this more than just a blip?

articles.description: Many Tottenham fans have already lost faith in Thomas Frank - but did Tuesday's 2-0 win over Borussia Dortmund give cause for optimism?
articles.title: Thomas Frank buys time with Tottenham win over Borussia Dortmund in Champions League

articles.description: Gabriel Jesus says he had "tears in my eyes" after scoring twice to help Arsenal win 3-1 at Inter Milan for a seventh successive win in the Champions League.
articles.title: Inter Milan 1-3 Arsenal: Gabriel Jesus enjoys two-goal haul for Gunners

articles.description: Audi is entering Formula 1 for the first time in its history this season, having taken over the Swiss-based Sauber team.
articles.title: Audi: New Formula 1 outfit aim to become must successful team in history

articles.description: A "near-perfect" Coco Gauff and world number one Aryna Sabalenka both blast their way into the Australian Open third round with speedy victories.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Coco Gauff and Aryna Sabalenka breeze through to third round

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe scores twice as Real Madrid thrash Monaco in Alvaro Arbeloa's first Champions League game in charge of the Spanish side.
articles.title: Real Madrid 6-1 Monaco: Kylian Mbappe scores twice against former club in convincing win
